Headline: # 94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/33rd
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 35th, Western, 31st and California due to street blockage near California/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound # 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 35th, Western, 31st, then resume their normal route on California due to street blockage near California/33rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
